mapper.insert: INSERT INTO workflow (owner_user_id, name, description, status, version, graph) VALUES (#{ownerUserId}, #{name}, #{description}, #{status}, #{version}, #{graph})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM workflow WHERE id = #{id} AND owner_user_id = #{ownerUserId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM workflow WHERE id = #{id} AND owner_user_id = #{ownerUserId}
